item.title: The Fediverse
item.description:
The fediverse is a collection of community-owned, decentralized social networks that are constructed using the same ActivityPub protocol.

It contains popular, ad free alternatives to large corporate social networks like Facebook and Twitter.

It has the big boys scared, and for good reason.

From fediverse.to:

Each fediverse instance is managed by a human admin. You can find fediverse instances dedicated to art, music, technology, culture, or politics.

It has networks that are similar to fascist-owned and controlled corporations like Facebook/Meta, X, etc, but theyâ€™re much, much better. To start, it has no advertising or feed algorithms, and is filled with lots of kind, smart folks from all over the world.
